评论概述: The wrinkles do not come out
评论详情: This is a hard review to write. I bought 2, Christmas red in xl which was too big and wine in large which was perfect. I should have stuck to the Amazon recommendation. They style is fabulous! The design, the weight of the fabric, the stitching, the way it lays is perfect. The problem is the wrinkles will not some out in the lapel or arms no matter what you do. The wrinkles are in the same place on both tops. They have been steamed, dryer wrinkle removed, washed and the wrinkles are still there although softer. The colors are beautiful and match the photo. I wore a scarf which detracted from the slept in look the top gave off.

评论概述: This is a really nice blouse
评论详情: I normally don't order clothes online without trying them on first, but I did with this and I'm glad.This is made with quality fabric, the cut is stylish and it runs true to size.  It's been sewn well.  It fits well and looks cute on.  I've already washed it in the washing machine and dried it in the dryer and it came out just fine. Grace Karin is one of my favorite women dress sellers on Amazon.  Love color, quality and fit of this slenderizing green blouse.  Shipping was fast and prime free.  Oh yes, clothes are budget friendly.

Very nice blouse! Thick fabric but soft. Fits comfortable with a nice deep wine color.  Originally, I got this top for myself but my 42ddd wouldn't fit well. I usually wear 2x and this XL doesn't fit yet. My mother in the photo is wearing it with her C cup.  Normally, I could get away with sizing down, but not with this top.
Fabric was great (not thin material) and there was some stretch. Love the color. It would fit if I had bigger boobs. I wear a 36b and it did not look great on me.

I really love the unique design and color of this shirt. In execution, however, I find some issues. The cut of the crossover neckline continues over the breast, so that it tucks under one side, and the excess fabric really shows through. At the normal height of where the tucked piece diagonals down, it lays across the breast and makes a very obvious thick line where it runs. If you push it down, it still looks weird under the breast and it feels weird, too.  The crossed over piece really serves no function, either, so it would have been better if they just made a faux crossover at the V of the neck, like most people do. The rest of the shirt is fine- the sleeves are a good length, the material is neither rough nor soft, and the front bottom of the shirt continues in a unique way to end in a flap.
I'm loving this as a basic for work! It looks nice tucked into pants or with a pencil skirt. The neckline is really flattering. It is comfortable as well!
Nice quality shirt and love the color. I'm usually a medium but it was too snug. Ordering a large

评论概述: Perfect to go from casual to dressy.
评论详情: I have purchased four of these lovely tops.  They are a nice weight and can be worn with jeans or a skirt.  I am 5'8", 36 C-D, 145lbs, and I purchased size large.  I tried a medium in the sleeveless version of this top, however, it was slightly tight across the chest.  To remove the wrinkles, I tumbled them in the dryer on medium and hung them up immediately.  I do sew and have taken the sleeveless version of this top in about an inch in the waste to make them fit perfectly.  I may do the same with the 3/4 sleeve tops.  They are a great addition to any wardrobe and the price is amazing for the quality.

评论概述: Good for work or an evening out
评论详情: This shirt is very versatile.  It looks classy and conservative enough for work, but is also figure flattering for a night out on a date.  It had a hidden zipper, but I didn’t even notice it until I pulled the shirt on over my head.  It fit me well, but I could not go a size down.  For reference I am usually a S or M in shirts, 5’3”, 140lbs, 34DD.  The material does not breathe so it wouldn’t work for a warm day.
